page.title: 09DAY IN LIFE OF HOUSEWIFE
page.content: Her work begins at 7AM.At this time she makes a cup of tea for her family,using a teasmaid,a device used for making tea.After eating her cereal breakfast she then makes packed lunches for her family.Shortly after they leave for work,college or school,she begins some housework.Each day,her routine will differ according to which jobs need to be done.For example,a day could involve washing dirty clothes either by hand or using an electric washing machine;vacuuming a carpet using a hoover;or cleaning the windows.Most days she will prepare an evening meal for her family,using either frozen foods,ready prepared meals or homemade meals prepared by herself.This housewife has a cooker and a micro-wave oven.This is a special device which speeds cooking up and is becoming increasingly popular.
